actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 94-826.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 270 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Elkhart, Kans., for airport purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 94-826) Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to grant releases from restrictions on the use of specified property conveyed to the city of Elkhart, Kansas, for use as an airport. Conditions such release on agreement by the city to receive fair market value for any interest conveyed in such property, and on use of any proceeds therefrom for development or operation of a public airport.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Elkhart, Kans., for airport purposes.
